title: Crunchyroll 14-Day Trial
description: Crunchyroll offers ad-free East Asian media to an international online community. Gain access to anime, manga, drama, music, and electronic entertainment. Watch the latest shows 1 hour after they air in Japan. High quality videos on your TV and access to 1080p on the web. 14-day free trial.
instructions: Register an email, username, and password Enter your name and valid payment information Start your 14-day trial, $11.95 each month thereafter Virtual currency credits associated with 48-hour cancellations will be reversed. You must be a new user.
